channel.title: Design on XIE JINFENG
channel.description: Recent content in Design on XIE JINFENG

item.title: Future Healthy City: Youth Green Village in Urban Center
item.description: Current Reflections on Future Healthy Cities # Facing the proposition of a “Future Healthy City,” what is required is a designer’s clear understanding and accurate grasp of three major dimensions: future populations and behavioral patterns, future industries and development directions, and future urban spaces.

item.title: Cube 30
item.description: This is my first design, created in my freshman year, focusing on spatial composition.
